content.html: When I was just starting out in tech, I was taking thoughts posted by "famous" people in tech at face value. It was much later that I gained the experience to know that they don't apply for my context and situation. It's all contextual, and most those thoughts are just opinions.
content.value:
When I was just starting out in tech, I was taking thoughts posted by "famous" people in tech at face value. It was much later that I gained the experience to know that they don't apply for my context and situation.

It's all contextual, and most those thoughts are just opinions.
